content.body: Domenic: thoughts on using "nullable" instead of "null or": https://github.com/whatwg/notifications/pull/194/files?
content.formatted_body: Domenic: thoughts on using "nullable" instead of "null or": https://github.com/whatwg/notifications/pull/194/files?

content.body: Huh. I guess it's OK, but I've never done it and slightly prefer what I do...
Yeah, I similarly have mixed feelings. I guess I'll push back a bit and ask for an Infra discussion first, though even in IDL we kinda regret the ?-convention so maybe we should just not.
